name: The ORPHEUS Ruse
description: Infiltrate the enemy as a psychic spy, leaping from body to body by touch. Can you reveal the truth and find your own body before your mind disintegrates?

reviews.review_text: Many of the stats don't actually affect most of the game, the only reason to change which body you are in is in order to learn a short backstory of them used in the ending. There is no major difference in outcome regardless of your choices and most of your choices are meaningless.
